node.title: Minnie Mouse to debut pantsuit designed by Stella McCartney
node.description: The character ditches her classic polka-dot dress for a progressive pantsuit.
node.content: ["Walt Disney's iconic character Minnie Mouse, the long-time sweetheart of Mickey Mouse, is getting a major wardrobe update in honor of Women's History month in March, the company said.\u00a0", "Her classic white gloves, red bow, polka-dot dress with white bloomers and low-heeled shoes first debuted in 1928. Now, British designer Stella McCartney is given her a more progressive and modern look in 2022.", "Stella McCartney has designed Minnie Mouse's very first pantsuit, and it's gorgeous \ud83d\ude0d #DisneylandParis30 pic.twitter.com/jKSckBji36", "\"I wanted Minnie to wear her very first pantsuit at Disneyland Paris, so I have designed one of my iconic costumes \u2013 a blue tuxedo \u2013 using responsibly sourced fabrics,\" McCartney said in an official release. \"This new take on her signature polka dots makes Minnie Mouse a symbol of progress for a new generation.\"", "The outfit change has been met with both compliments and criticism, coming on the heels of the debate over the recent\u00a0redesign of Mars' M&Ms characters.", "Tr\u00e8s chic! https://t.co/sDsqu4NEKQ", "Former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton, known for her pantsuits, tweeted, \"Tr\u00e8s chic!\" \u2014 while political commentator Candace Owens criticized the new look during a Fox News appearance.", "\u201cThey\u2019re taking all of these things that nobody was offended by and feel like they have to get rid of them and destroy them because they\u2019re bored.\u201d - @realcandaceo on Disney changing Minnie Mouse\u2019s outfit pic.twitter.com/1CoVw8Eiyc", "The change is part of several other entertainment announcements by the Walt Disney Company to honor Disneyland Paris' 30th anniversary.", "The company also said McCartney will market a Minnie Mouse T-shirt to coincide with International Women's Rights Day. This T-shirt will be exclusively available online and in Stella stores March 8.", "For Breaking News & Analysis Download the Free CBS News app"]
